text: Charles Everett Johnson (born January 3, 1972) is a former professional American football player who was drafted by the Pittsburgh Steelers in the first round (17th overall) of the 1994 NFL Draft. A 6'0", 202-lb. wide receiver from the University of Colorado, Johnson played nine seasons in the National Football League from 1994 to 2002 for the Steelers, the Philadelphia Eagles, the New England Patriots, and the Buffalo Bills.
